OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

returns.prices: The list of prices for the specified assets.

returns._0: An array of feed addresses used for this asset.
True if the sequencer oracle data is valid and chain is considered active.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newFallbackOracle: The address of the new fallback oracle contract.

setFeeds(address[],address[][]).details: The length of `assets` must match the length of `feeds`.

params.assets: The list of asset addresses to update.
params.feeds: The list of feed address arrays, each corresponding to an asset in `assets`.

params.newGracePeriod: The new grace period in seconds.

params.newSequencerOracle: The address of the new sequencer oracle contract.

params.newTimeout: The new timeout value in seconds.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

decimals().notice: Retrieves the number of decimals used by the oracle.

fallbackOracle().notice: Returns the address of a fallback oracle used when Chainlink feeds are unavailable or invalid.

getAssetPrice(address).notice: Retrieves the price of a specified asset.

getAssetsPrices(address[]).notice: Retrieves the prices of a list of specified assets.

getFeeds(address).notice: Retrieves the list of Chainlink feeds associated with a specific asset.

gracePeriod().notice: Returns the grace period (in seconds) allowed after a sequencer outage before the feed is considered valid again.

isSequencerValid().notice: Checks if the sequencer oracle deems the chain as properly sequenced.

sequencerOracle().notice: Returns the address of the sequencer oracle contract.

setFallbackOracle(address).notice: Sets a new fallback oracle address, used when the primary feeds are invalid or stale.

setFeeds(address[],address[][]).notice: Updates the Chainlink feed addresses for multiple assets at once.

setGracePeriod(uint256).notice: Updates the grace period value, controlling how long after a sequencer outage the feed data remains invalid.

setSequencerOracle(address).notice: Updates the sequencer oracle address, used to verify chain health/state.

setTimeout(uint256).notice: Updates the timeout value, after which feed data is considered stale.

timeout().notice: Returns the timeout value (in seconds) after which oracle data is considered invalid.
